actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe passenger motor vehicle occupants with maximum protection in motor vehicle accidents.

summary.text: Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to apply the provisions governing the promulgation and enforcement of bumper standards applicable to the promulgation and enforcement of frame standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe passenger motor vehicle occupants with maximum protection in motor vehicle accidents.
